summary: Two-Factor Authentication (2FA) package for generating and validating time-based one-time passwords (TOTP) in your automation workflows.
description: ## Overview The 2FA package enables you to work with two-factor authentication systems programmatically. Use it when your automation needs to log into services protected by 2FA, or when you need to generate OTP codes for testing and verification purposes.
